name: com.kazky.ide.antigravity
description: Antigravity AI editor integration for Unity. Adds support for generating csproj files for intellisense purposes, auto discovery of installations, and seamless AI-powered coding assistance within Unity workflows.

_upm.changelog:
Initial Release:

- Add Antigravity integration
- Auto-discovery of Antigravity installations
- Project file generation support
- Cross-platform support (Windows, macOS, Linux)
